titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of September 19 through September 23, 2022, as "Malnutrition Awareness Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of September 19 through September 23, 2022, as "Malnutrition Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, Education and Labor, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution supports the designation of Malnutrition Awareness Week.
